list.list1: This Pricing and Commission Policy (the „Policy“) defines the principles, structure, and applicable commission rates for sellers offering products through the Reli.one marketplace (the „Platform“).
list.list2: The Policy applies to all sellers registered on the Platform, unless explicitly agreed otherwise in an individual written agreement.
list.list3: The purpose of this Policy is to ensure transparency, predictability, and fairness in the calculation of marketplace commissions.

principlesBlock.title: General Principles

list.list1: Reli.one applies a fixed commission rate per main product category.

principlesBlock.afterText: and do not affect the applicable commission rate.

yList1.list1: are flat within each main category,
yList1.list2: do not depend on subcategories, product type, brand, or price tiers,
yList1.list3: are charged only upon successful completion of a transaction.

list.list1: Reli.one may apply a maximum commission cap per order for selected categories or transactions. Where applicable, such caps will be communicated transparently in the Seller Panel or individual agreements.
list.list2: Any preferential rates, promotional discounts, or individual commercial terms apply only if expressly agreed in writing and do not amend this Policy for other sellers.

list.list1: Reli.one reserves the right to amend this Policy in order to:
list.list2: Any changes will be published on the Platform and shall become effective on the date indicated therein.

yList.list3: respond to regulatory or market developments.

list.list1: Reli.one is committed to maintaining a simple and transparent fee structure.
list.list2: Unlike marketplaces that apply complex tiered or subcategory-based pricing, Reli.one ensures that sellers are able to clearly determine their commission rate in advance, without hidden conditions.

contactBlock.title: Contact
contactBlock.desc: For questions regarding this Policy, sellers may contact:
